text:
This example just shortly blinks and then the graphics disappears.

I know, I am not very specific in this bug report. I can try to break down the 
different animations and see where it fails. Will take some time. Just 
reporting this bug now for completeness.
creator: neumann@karto.baug.ethz.ch

text:
(In reply to comment #0)
> This example just shortly blinks and then the graphics disappears.

Unable to reproduce using the trunk version (revision 733247). The path morphing appears as expected, in comparison with Opera 10a (build 1139).

Nevertheless, by performing the comparison with Opera, I noticed why the filling was so strange in Batik: the pattern seems pretty messed up, whereas in Opera it displays as coherently expected (that is, with the flag colors of Austria and Switzerland. :-|

I'd say this example needs to be further reduced in order to hunt down this weird pattern behavior. I'll probably try to do this myself whenever I find some more spare time but, for now, I guess updating this issue's status was more valuable than defer that for I-don't-know-how-long... :-)

Removing the "path morphing" from the summary and changing operating system to all as I noticed this using Windows XP SP3. Also Batik version was updated to 1.8. Can this be confirmed on Mac also (Andreas?) just to make sure I'm not assuming this incorrectly?
creator: helder.magalhaes@gmail.com
